ComicInfo.Summary:
Katie’s managed to get out of the alternate universe she was trapped in. And now she’s gone straight to… HELL!!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including two covers from Dan Mendoza (Zombie Tramp, DollFace)!!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|----------------------------------------------|---------------|------------------| | A | Regular Cover | Marcelo Costa | 1 | | B | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Marcelo Costa | 2 | | C | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Axebone | 3 | | D | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Axebone | 4 | | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 1500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 |
Note: Overall issue #31.
ComicInfo.Title: Queen of Hell Part Two
